import React, { useState } from 'react' import './EditItemModal.css' function EditItemModal({showEditItem, setShowEditItem, setUserItems, userItems, handleCloseUserItemFormModal, item}) { const {item_name, description, original_pricing,condition} = item const [formState, setFormState] = useState({ item_name: `${item_name}`, description: `${description}`, original_pricing: `${original_pricing}`, condition: `${condition}` }) function handleItemEditChange (e) { setFormState({...formState, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } return ( <>




) } export default EditItemModal
